text: Harley Davidson and the Marlboro Man is a 1991 American action western movie directed by Simon Wincer and starring Mickey Rourke, Don Johnson, Chelsea Field, Daniel Baldwin, Vanessa Williams, Tom Sizemore, Tia Carrere. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and was a box office failure. It received generally negative reviews from critics. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1991 action movies Category:1990s road movies Category:1990s Western (genre) movies Category:1990s American action movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies about alcohol Category:Movies about drugs Category:Movies about smoking Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Simon Wincer Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: Harley Davidson and the Marlboro Man
